statements: SELECT * FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, academic_performance FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id = 4 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, attendance_records FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, academic_performance FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id > 5 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, attendance_records FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT student_id, student_name, academic_performance FROM StudentInformation WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' AND attendance_records->'2022'->>'January' = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, date FROM attendance_records WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM academic_performance WHERE program = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM attendance_records ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, program FROM academic_performance WHERE grade >= 'B';
SELECT student_id, date, attended FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM academic_performance WHERE program = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(date) AS latest_attendance_date FROM attendance_records GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, grade, program FROM academic_performance JOIN attendance_records ON academic_performance.student_id = attendance_records.student_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_records WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance_records;
SELECT student_id, subject, grade FROM academic_performance WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name AS Name, gender AS Gender FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, gender FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN academic_performance ON students.student_id = academic_performance.student_id WHERE subject = 'Math' ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date, is_present FROM students JOIN attendance_records ON students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id WHERE is_present = True ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) as total_attendance FROM students JOIN attendance_records ON students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_attendance > 5;
SELECT student_name, subject, grade FROM students JOIN academic_performance ON students.student_id = academic_performance.student_id WHERE grade >= 'A' ORDER BY subject, grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name FROM teachers WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT class_name, teacher_name FROM classes INNER JOIN teachers ON classes.teacher_name = teachers.teacher_name;
SELECT department_name, teacher_name FROM teachers INNER JOIN departments ON teachers.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT student_name, attendance_record FROM students;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, class_name, teacher_name FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id JOIN teachers ON classes.teacher_name = teachers.teacher_name;
SELECT student_name, academic_performance FROM students WHERE academic_performance LIKE '%Excellent%';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY class_id DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM SpecialEdPrograms;
SELECT record_date, attendance_status FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT student_name, exam_name, exam_score FROM Students JOIN AcademicPerformance ON Students.student_id = AcademicPerformance.student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT s.student_name, ap.exam_name, ap.exam_score FROM Students s INNER JOIN AcademicPerformance ap ON s.student_id = ap.student_id WHERE ap.exam_score > 90;
SELECT sp.program_name, sp.program_description FROM SpecialEdPrograms sp LEFT JOIN ProgramMapping pm ON sp.program_id = pm.program_id WHERE pm.student_id IS NULL;

SELECT s.student_name, ar.record_date, ar.attendance_status FROM Students s INNER JOIN AttendanceRecords ar ON s.student_id = ar.student_id WHERE s.grade_level = 10 AND ar.attendance_status = 'Present';
